definition: square/frame/rule/(legal) case/style/character/standard/pattern/(grammar) case/(classical) to obstruct/to hinder/(classical) to arrive/to come/(classical) to investigate/to study exhaustively

sentences.english: But amidst all of this, some truths emerge. Leadership and personality matter a lot.
sentences.chinese: 但是除此之外，还要记得领导能力和人格魅力很重要。

sentences.english: He can convey the force of personality, the charm and the charisma.
sentences.chinese: 他能传达出曼德拉的人格魅力和感召力。

sentences.english: The professor's charisma must speak for itself. All the students love him.
sentences.chinese: 教授以自己的人格魅力，成为学生们拥戴的对象。

sentences.english: Somehow, the act of self-giving is a personal power-releasing factor.
sentences.chinese: 自我付出是一种人格魅力的释放。

sentences.english: Work should ennoble, not kill, the human spirit.
sentences.chinese: 工作应该使人格升华，它不应扼杀人格魅力。

sentences.english: The noble character' s charm is the basis to do the united front work.
sentences.chinese: 人格魅力是做好统战工作的基础。

sentences.english: No 1, he has classic character magic power.
sentences.chinese: 第一，他具有高贵地人格魅力。

sentences.english: Approached Weijianjun, You can feel the most is his personal charm and vitality.
sentences.chinese: 走近魏建军，你最能感受的是他的人格魅力和活力了。

definition: one's character/fret (on fingerboard of lute or guitar)
to convince/to subdue/to be convinced/to be bowled over
emotional quotient (EQ)/emotional IQ/abbr. for 情緒商數|情绪商数[qing2 xu4 shang1 shu4]
(personal) warmth/approachability/accessibility/(in a product) user friendliness/(chemistry) affinity
to have the power to rally supporters
